item.title: This isn't urgent, but i wouldn't mind to have ::giveco-owner
item.dc:creator: @jtsou jtsou
item.description:
@jtsou wrote:

Co-owner/owner would be playerrights 3, playerrights 4 is hidden admin, so use this code:

if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR ACCOUNT NAME HERE")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sendMessage("You have been made co-owner by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.playerRights = 3; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: This isn't urgent, but i wouldn't mind to have ::giveco-owner

item.title: This isn't urgent, but i wouldn't mind to have ::giveco-owner
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR ACCOUNT NAME HERE")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 4; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

so the command would be like this
::giveowner (playername)

Read full topic
